website_summaries.verdict: The 3-pronged design of these grill tongs flips food efficiently. Made with a stainless steel exterior, these tongs are great for flipping burgers and cooking fish.
pros: Made by the makers of the USA's top grilling surface, GrillGrates
cons: A higher price point than other options available

customer_reviews.title: not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: professional should not appear in the product description. they are too flimsy to be of much good. so far, they don't work fr ribs or chicken and that is what I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Grillgrates
customer_reviews.text: The GrillGrate company's grilling surface is my favorite for producing nice wide dark seared marks on meats. The flat GrillGrate spatula fits between the rails and is easy to turn meats, but this pair of tongs gives much more control of the pieces of meat when turning. Worth adding it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: this is a great addition to firmly grasp burgers
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, I had the single "flipper" model that came with my grill grates, this is a great addition to firmly grasp burgers, wings and stakes. If you have grill grates, these are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well made. You can use it to exercise your wrists while grilling. However, if you have Carpal Tunnel syndrome don't get this. You won't be able to squeeze it closed. It's just well made! I use it with the PK 360 optional grate. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimjimmy

customer_reviews.title: This tong style is a great improvement and has become my "go to" tool
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Grill Grates for over a year. When I purchased them the company only had a single slotted "flipper". This tong style is a great improvement and has become my "go to" tool. BTW, the Grill Grates are fantastic. Much less flare up but still nice smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great GrillGrates! They are bigger then I originally thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Great GrillGrates! They are bigger then I originally thought but I love them. I'm able to grab and turn over any size steak and gently roll over my grape tomatoes as well. After getting 5 GrillGrates to cover my entire grill, the GrateSpatula and the GrateTongs, Grilling is fun and easy.
customer_reviews.author: BUM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works awesome for spatchcock chicken on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: James McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Good for use with grates.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had 4 fingers on each side and the handle was a little longer. So close, but not quite great.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: If you have Grill Grates, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Got the Grill Grates, this tool just works perfectly with them.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs for my RecTec Pellet grill using the Grill Grates I added for searing meat ...
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the GrillGrates!
customer_reviews.text: These work great with GrillGrates, but they should work with other grates as well.
customer_reviews.author: JT Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great seller, Item as described, Fast shipping, Will use again!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Samra

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and not super sturdy but it does work for the grillgrates
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the grillgrates.
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are great for handling fish and smaller items (like cherry tomatoes or mushrooms). I use them for everything now.
customer_reviews.author: Hank from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these tongs for my "GrillGrates" even over the "GrillGrate" spatula!
customer_reviews.author: Parkerville

product_meta.title: Grate Tongs Professional Grilling Tongs
product_meta.description:
Take your barbecue grilling to the next level with our revolutionary grill tongs with triple prong design. If you or your loved ones are passionate about their grill, this grilling tool is a must have. 

There is nothing worse than dropping or crushing food on the grill in the middle of a family barbecue.

GrillGrates Ultimate BBQ Tongs- the GrateTongs! Designed with a trident prong clamp to grip food for the perfect A+ flip, these tongs are used the world over by famous barbecue pit masters and award winning competition chefs.



Features

1. Long 25" handle for grilling at a distance. Easy to grip, easy to use, easy to control. 

 2. Three pronged design flips food efficiently and effectively. No other grilling tongs on the market are like it.



 3. Equipped with a stainless steel exterior these tongs won't be needing a replacement anytime soon. 

 4. No clamps! This means no scraping, scratching, or mushing. 

 5. An incredible gift for any seasoned griller. We guarantee the GrateTongs will make an IMMEDIATE difference.
feature_bullets: ★ AWARD WINNING DESIGN- Revolutionary design takes all the pain out of grabbing and flipping.
★ THREE PRONGED HEAD- Allows for greater control, better food maneuverability, and easy flipping.
★ STAINLESS STEEL- Built to last decades. The GrateTongs will outlive all other cooking utensils.
★ FROM THE MAKERS OF GRILLGRATES - The Makers of the USA's top grilling surface. National BBQ Association awarded 5 stars ★ ★ ★ ★ ★.
★ FANTASTIC GIFT ITEM - Perfect birthday / special occasion item for grill fanatics.
